definitions.definition: An office holder invested with powers and authorities.
definitions.example: David Barnes was the official charged with the running of the sports club.

definitions.definition: A person responsible for applying the rules of a game or sport in a competition.
definitions.example: In most soccer games there are three officials: the referee and two linesmen.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to an office or public trust.
Derived from the proper office or officer, or from the proper authority; made or communicated by virtue of authority
(pharmaceutical) Sanctioned by the pharmacopoeia; appointed to be used in medicine; officinal.
Relating to an office; especially, to a subordinate executive officer or attendant.
Relating to an ecclesiastical judge appointed by a bishop, chapter, archdeacon, etc., with charge of the spiritual jurisdiction.

definitions.example: Well, it's official: you lost your mind!
